code: @Before public void startUp() {     byte[] bytes = PAYLOAD.getBytes().     buf = PooledByteBufAllocator.DEFAULT.buffer(bytes.length).     buf.writeBytes(bytes). }

@Test public void testConversionWithExchange() {     String result = context.getTypeConverter().convertTo(String.class, new DefaultExchange(context), buf).     assertNotNull(result).     assertEquals(PAYLOAD, result). }
@Test public void testConversionWithoutExchange() {     String result = context.getTypeConverter().convertTo(String.class, buf).     assertNotNull(result).     assertEquals(PAYLOAD, result). }
